heading: HR01338
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE MANAGEMENT AND ADMINISTRATION OF THE COUNTRY'S RADIO FREQUENCY SPECTRUM BY THE NATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION
status: Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-03-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01338
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE MANAGEMENT AND ADMINISTRATION OF THE COUNTRY'S RADIO FREQUENCY SPECTRUM BY THE NATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, VICTOR A.
DATE FILED : 2017-09-26
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Oaminal (000 2018-03-21)2. Belaro (000 2018-03-21)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for Meeting/Hearing on 2017-12-13
          -Taking into consideration that there are still some points that need deeper information, the meeting ended with an advice that another meeting will be scheduled on the matter.
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2018-01-23
      3. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-03-14
          -Considering the broad scope of the subject matter, Rep. Velarde moved, duly seconded by Vice Chairperson Rose Marie ‘Baby’ Arenas, for the creation and referral of the measures to the TWG to further study and expand the proposed measures’ coverage if needed.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY ON 2017-10-10
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-10-10;
